channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2024020208
item.description:
Report X-2024020208

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-08
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2024020208: SequenceEvent: The package at some point during transit was upside down. This caused pressure on the lid seal and caused leakage from the cap. Package was placed upright in Hazmat bag and drum. DescribePack: Lid seal due to pressure. Leakage from lid. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: package placed upright. X-2024020232: SequenceEvent: At some point during transit the package was placed upside down. This caused pressure on the lid seal and leakage. Package was placed upright in hazmat bag and drum. DescribePack: lid seal due to pressure. Leakage from lid. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package placed upright. X-2024020233: SequenceEvent: At some point during transit package was upside down. This caused pressure to the lid seal and leakage. Package was placed upright in hazmat bag and drum. DescribePack: Lid seal. Leakage from lid. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package placed upright.

item.description:
